categories: Category:Desler Gizh Outworld Mobility Corporation products

nodes.text: Desler Gizh Outworld Mobility Corporation was a company which produced the Koro-2 all-environment Exodrive airspeeder. Shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars, the Clawdite bounty hunter Zam Wesell flew in a Koro-2 airspeeder on the planet Coruscant when trying to assassinate Senator Padmé Amidala.

Desler Gizh Outworld Mobility Corporation was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: Attack of the Clones Incredible Cross-Sections, which was written by Curtis Saxton and released in 2002. The company was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
